982070.name: Capsa - Character Flags Patterns Pack
982070.description:
The Capsa - Character Flag Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your characters clothes.

This pack of cosmetic items contains clothing patterns for both male and female characters, supporting hoodies, t-shirts, long-sleeve t-shirts, bikini tops and swimsuits.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Character Australian Patterns
  • Character Austrian Patterns
  • Character Belgian Patterns
  • Character Brazilian Patterns
  • Character Bulgarian Patterns
  • Character Canadian Patterns
  • Character Czech Patterns
  • Character Chilean Patterns
